|}}'''''Lord of the Rings''''' is a video game version of [[wikipedia:Mahjong|mahjong]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/> In this game all chinese symbols are replaced with [[Angerthas|runes]], places, objects and characters from [[Middle-earth]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/>
